nodes.text: Maravada was the male leader of a civilization which occupied the city of Kaleth and the site of the ancient Je'daii Order's Temple of Knowledge sometime after the Force Wars on Tython. Known as Maravada the Silent, Maravada was a philospher and a recluse, and dedicated his time to categorizing and naming the elements of the cosmos. His reign was remembered as a time of peace and learning, which contrasted sharply with that of one of his predecessors Avamarivash. A history of Maravada's reign could be found in the Chamber of Speech in Kaleth up until the Cold War-era and the Jedi Order's return to Tython.
